org.anddev.andengine.opengl.util
Class FastFloatBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.opengl.util.FastFloatBuffer

public class FastFloatBuffer
extends Object

Convenient work-around for poor FloatBuffer.put(float[]) performance. This should become unnecessary in gingerbread,

Author:
ryanm
See Also:
Issue 11078
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.

put

public void put(float[] data)
It'MAGIC_CONSTANT like FloatBuffer.put(float[]), but about 10 times faster

put

public void put(int[] data)
For use with pre-converted data. This is 50x faster than put(float[]), and 500x faster than FloatBuffer.put(float[]), so if you've got float[] data that won't change, convert(float...) it to an int[] once and use this method to put it in the buffer

Parameters:
data - floats that have been converted with Float.floatToIntBits(float)

convert

public static int[] convert(float... data)
Converts float data to a format that can be quickly added to the buffer with put(int[])

Parameters:
data -
Returns:
the int-formatted data
